<title level="1" right="Focus 3" pfs="Standard">[Embrace the Pit](/Spells.aspx?ID=506)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evil" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=64" />
<trait label="Morph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=113" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 404 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Bloodline**
[Diabolic](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=4)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

Devil horns grow from your skull, and your skin takes on features of the devil responsible for your diabolic bloodline. You gain resistance 5 to evil, fire, and poison, and resistance 1 to physical damage (except silver). You can take good damage, even if you aren't evil, and you gain weakness 5 to good damage.

---
**Heightened (+2)** The resistance to evil, fire, and poison increases by 5, the resistance to physical damage (except silver) by 2, and the weakness to good damage by 5.
name: Embrace the Pit
